content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside,spotted  the star ufo's again,we have been watching them for 3 years now,same location.We observed them for the last two nights,always multiple sightings in a night.
content.summary: Been watching these star like ufo for a few years now

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from getting the mail when i noticed a massive sliver cylinder in the sky, i ran inside to get my girlfriend and when we came back out it was gone
content.summary: A silver cigar shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my son towards my house (going west). we stopped on about 113/114 madison ave to wait for the crossing light to change. i looked up to the south along the manhattan grid line straight down madison ave and saw 9 lights. i immediately thought that they were military helipcopters by the way they were moving. i looked away and then looked again and saw they were slowly moving north. i snapped the first picture. they appeared orange. i kept looking and asking my son if he saw them as well and he stated that he did (he's 5 years old and knows the difference between moon and stars etc.  i snapped the second picture and saw there were now 6 ufos. i kept thinking they must be helicopters. and noticed that one of them were. that one wasn't the same orange as the others and i saw it's flashing lights. then that helicopter did not pass over me, it just disappeared! then the third picture shows six lights (all of them being the same color and having the same motions. the fourth picture shows only four, the others had vanished as well. the fifth picture is blurry and you could see the moon being the brightist light with a planet/star about 45 degrees to the moons north east. a blurry spot to the top left of this picture was a dust particle on my camera (iphone 5s) and below that are 3/4 ufos. the sixth picture i find most interesting as you can see the moon and the planet again to the right half of the picture and on the left you'll see five objects (one even larger or perhaps closer to the earths surface than the others. this larger object appears (when zoomed in on) to have its own two lights to its left side! in the seventh and eighth pictures i tried to zoom with my camera to take these pictures while focusing on one object (the only one that was there in the sky at this moment). the sky was extremely clear. the sun had jus set if not completely set. none of the objects appeared to fly over me even though they were heading north. in this instance i took my son and walked south towards where the objects were appearing to follow them. i had a thought that they might be chinese lanterns but they appeared to be very large ( maybe the size of an average car) but all of them had switched directions as i noticed there was no wind or sound or even a rumbling!  no other persons in my vacinity had looked up at these objects and i was tempted to ask random people if they saw what me and my son were seeing. as we walked south to 112th street, still on madison ave, i noticed that one had switched direction and heading due west. as we walked slowly following the objects, i took pictures nine and ten which have three lights in each that formed nearly a perfect triangle but each picture varied in the direction that each triangle was pointing. i crossed madison avenue, nearing 112th street, when i snapped the final picture (eleven not able to include due to the site) and saw the object going west and then we lost sight of it as if it had completely vanished! i have no idea what these may be but i used the process of illumination as i watched them; they're not helicopters, definitely not planes and they can't be balloons because they produced their own lights and had controlled direction. this isn't my first personal experience with potential ufos. a couple years ago, i'm not sure when but it was around the same time of year but at about 12:30 am, i had crossed madison ave at 115th street. there were no cars as i looked southward down madison avenue. the sky was clear and very dark, a slight breeze, i looked directly above the south horizon and saw a light. it was whitish with a slight blue color to it. i stopped when i crossed madison and stared at it. it slowly moved directly north for about 15 seconds and then as it approached almost directly above me, it shifted east and disappeared over one of the buildings. i got to snap a picture of it and i believe i may still have it on my old ce phone. but this experience yesterday was a major surprise for me.
content.summary: Witnessed 9 ufos from the south heading north and then some dissappeared and then a few would show up from no where and they all changed direction and did not pass over me as i was facing south.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: About a month ago i noticed an object traveling towards my position(five miles south of laytonville ,ca., my property.)from over the pacific ocean. when the craft(as i am defining it) reached a position approx. five miles north of cahto peak and about half a mile over the top of the ridge, it stopped and hovered for almost forty minutes, and then receded back towards the original place i saw it. over the last several weeks it returned three more times including last night and the night before. i observed that the object stopped in the same approx. position each time. the night before last it hovered for some time before descending down until it vanished behind the top of the ridge(approx.4300ft.Elev.).Into a roadless area that was burned last year. i did not see it re-appear. last night i decided that this was a rare and un-explained sighting and decided to take photos if it returned which it did at about the same time(10:20 pm). this area has been used for many years for military training flights and i have seen almost every kind of plane and helicopter ever made fly over but nothing like this has ever been seen that i know of. at first sight i thought it was a helicopter coming in from over the ocean. after seeing this i am really disturbed. it is like nothing i know of. i have recently sighted the iss from my house and at almost 200 miles up it looks about the same size as this thing does from a lot lower. i hope it not an enemy craft meaning to do us harm. the fact that it returns over and over and is near the communication link for all the companies is interesting as well.Last night i got some amazing photos and while i was taking my camera down the object simply vanished from view.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: For an hour watched as craft approached same spot in low horizonnear communication towers. hovered  and descended behind mountain.

content.detailedDescription:
Around midnight on may 24th 2015 we saw an object fly almost directly over us at a very fast rate. the object looked like 2 slightly swept back, long skinny wings with no center body. there were no lights and no sound. from the time we first saw it untill it flew overhead and behind the houses lasted aprox. 4-5 seconds. about 1 minute later anothe one following the same flight path flew over us. about 2 minutes after that 2 more, flying extreemly close together flew directly over us. these objects continued to appear at random intervals, all were flying from south to north, but not the exact flight paths. some were to our right, some to our left and some directly over us. most of them appeared to be the same size, but there was one much smaller one, and one much larger one. we witnessed this over a two and a half hour period of time and saw more than 20 of these wings fly over.
none had lights, there was no sound, no contrails. the sky was clear, the weather was calm and chilly.
content.summary: We saw at least 20 wing like oblects of varios sizes fly over us over a 2 1/2 hour period.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were having coffee on our second floor balcony.She observed the object in the east over the ocean.I then observed it myself..The object appeared to be quite far but i could see a spherical object that was somewhat reflective underneath high thin clouds.The object was stationary but was emitting at random times a bright reddish light.There was at the time a strong onshore easterly breeze yet there was no movement of the object for about a half hour.
content.summary: Stationary object sighted over virginia beach over the ocean on busy holiday weekend

content.detailedDescription: I was at the downtown houston skate park on sabine st. with my family. we were leaving and the skyline looked really pretty and i wanted to take some pictures (outside with no windows or glass surrounding me) at 8:44pm before i got into the car. i noticed what i thought was an airplane and another lighted object and thought how it would add to my night time, lit up building photos. when i got it the car and looked at my photos i saw the object and quickly noticed it was an ufo that has been reported before by various people around the world. i looked back outside and it was gone. i looked to see if any objects were at the height of where the object was. nothing. no street lights either. in the pictures you can see the object moved across and up. when i took the pictures, i stood in the same spot and the times of the photos (4), taken on my iphone, are all within one minute at 8:44pm. the weather was humid from a few storms that have been in the area over the last few days. i was extremely excited and grateful the craft showed itself to me for photographing for i am a true believer in our extended galactic family. i will never forget this evening!
content.summary: Ring of lights ufo over downtown houston, texas

content.detailedDescription: I wassitting in my car on a 1 a in the parking  lot of the reef restaurant.It was approximately 12 in the morning to 3 in the morning i'm not sure of the exact date but i was sitting in my car facing the ocean when i saw a huge ship come out of the ocean with lights on it it made waves and it hoovered for a second or two and the vibrations were so strong i could feel them and hear them from my car even with the window up i was amazed and didn't understand what it was but i figured it might be a ufo it then at a 45 degree angle shot off into the sky and it was gone within the twinkling of an eye.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a ship come out of the ocean and hoover for a brief second and and wave like sonic sound. then go up at a 45 degree angle and shoot up the the air and disappear. i was

content.detailedDescription:
I had just concluded an evening of fishing on misery bay at presque isle state park.As i got into my truck to leave i looked at my watch,it was 8:25 pm.I proceeded to pull out on to the road driving west toward perry's monument bridge.From where i parked to the bridge was only a few hundred feet.As i approached the bridge i looked to my left (south) toward perry's monument and noticed a bright light near the monument up in the air.The light was coming closer,the intensity of the brightness eminating from it increasing as it neared.There were other people present around the monument area and parking lot but they seemed oblivious to the entire event.I crossed the bridge and was having a difficult time both driving my vehicle and trying to watch this thing.

li was fixated on it,driving half in one lane,half in the other.As the thing got directly over me it slowed down and changed direction almost as if it noticed that i noticed it.I pulled my truck into the parking area near perry's monument and stopped.Putting it in park,i could focus all my attention on the craft which was directly over the road i just pulled off of. the craft was triangular in shape , not congruent.It was solid but i could not distinguish fine detail because the entire surface area was bright glowing orange.Almost like steel heated in a blast furnace.The craft hovered at it's original altitude over the road,i could not take my eyes off of it.In that brief moment i actually felt uncertainty and fear as i did not know what would happen next.The craft then began to move at first north and then west. it looked like it was moving down the northern shore of the peninsula.I attempted to follow it in my vehicle ,but i ran out of road and was unable to keep up with it.The whole event lasted only 3 to 4 minutes.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have seen unexplainable things before  but always at extreme distance. this thing flew directly over my position. i am100percent  positive it was not a plane,helicopter,hot air balloon or any other known man made craft.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of the observation i was standing in my front yard smoking a cigarette. when all of a sudden i noticed this huge object to my left and the star light and lights from the city were being obscured. it seemed to be just over the roof tops across the street from me. i could only see it's out line which seemed to be a v shape. as wide as a city block. i looked around for someone else to see this but it too late at night. it was going quite slow but i could hear the air passing over it. it was so large that it probably took a couple minutes to completely pass me. i could hear a low hum almost like a star cruiser on star wars. i know that sounds weird but that's the only way to describe it. at the last moment when it finally passed me a large hatch on the under side or on the right side appeared. i could only see it for maybe ten seconds. it was rectangular like a door but huge. maybe as big as a semi in size. no lights at all. just a massively huge size. no windows or antennas were visible. this was a very dark cloudless night. very still barely a breeze at all. i only mentioned this to a couple people and they just kind of shrugged it off. so i never talk about it. i don't know how to enter sketches on the computer but i can provide them by mail if needed... sorry.
content.summary: Giant object slowly passed overhead in front of me blacking out the distant light of okc. huge size humming and you could hear the air passing over it. a hatch appeard .

content.detailedDescription: Saw this object in the sky flashing brightly,first i thoght it was a ballon but when it changed directions i knew otherwise. it moves slowly no noise then lost sight of object after 5 minutes.
content.summary: Saw a object flashing in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me a teen. friend also maybe sixteen hanging out at remote cabin between house mnt and faust watched orange red glow move without sound down nearby trail 60 yrds or so away. go south down trail. was my first sighting. really need to contact mufon im known as a mountain man in my area and i don't have regular use of a computer please contact number leave message i don't have cell. its real and i cant hold in  any longer its not human or animal what i have seen. i also think the remoteness of the place has something to do with it if anyone wants me to take them to the hot spot i can on remote home made atv trails i just wana know what i saw
content.summary: Me and friend at a remote cabin watched orange red glow go down trail

content.detailedDescription: I have been filming these objects for almost 2 weeks now this is one of the best videos i have but not the longest i have. the orb leaves the area for a few minutes appears to clean up the sky then returns to near sun.
content.summary: Bright orb leaving the sun and hiding in clouds then returns

content.detailedDescription: Me, my 13 year old daughter and her 2 friends were coming west bound on mountain rd.From the local wendy's and we as soon as we made a right turn onto mansion house crossing road we all saw 4 round shaped lights in the sky to the left side of us above the trees. we were kinda scared and i kept asking the girls do you guys see this and they said yes and they were very scared, after maybe a minute or 2 they seemed to just disappear, they didn't fade out they were just gone, vanished.
content.summary: 4 bright orange round hovering spheres were observed in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were out back of our house in front of the bonfire with the dog. out of nowhere the dog started to act weird jumping around running in circles we were watching him run through the leafs with the flashlight my wife was laughing then looked at me and said crazy dog. then says babe what the hell is that? i looked through the trees only to see what appeared to be a circular like object, it looked like a burning red ball of fire going through the sky from left to right. we were watching it through the trees in our backyard until it dropped past the tree line and it disappeared. freaked out my wife grabs my arm and said lets get the hell back in the house i'm done let the fire burn half the state down we gotta go inside.
content.summary: Glowing ball of fire

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking along the st.Joseph river with my dogs like i usually do. this night was different it was south bends 150th birthday weekend and there was helicopter rides and hot air balloons and lights and lots of people..I observed this light in the north north east sky it looked like at firat which i thought was the one of the helicopters but it wasn't and then i thought it was a plane i also thought it may have been one of those floating lanterns..Nut it wasn't so i observed it at first change lights red green yellow bue then it was just red green and blue it hovered up and down then shot out at a diagonal then it went up and sown and then descended slowly like a floating feather then it sent back up this was going on for at least 10 minutes..I tried to video it and i even zoomed on it all i got was 30 seconds of video of the ground then my phone video cut off..I tried to record it again but my flash on my video went off since it was becoming dark it was around 937pm i notice the orb like red green blue turned to a white star like brightness.. well that startled me and i turned off video.. as soon as that happened the star like brightness went back to red green blue like orb.. i even asked to women who where walking behind me ..I told them do you see what i see..One told me yep its a plane.. they were not paying attention since they were more into there conversation then what i was looking at but they kept watching me as i walked in fron of them with my dogs..I notivce they kept noticing that i was watching the sky since i turned my head for a quick moment more like 6 seconds and it was gone..I don't know what i witnessed but planes and helicopters don't go off in diagonal directions then float down and then hover stationary...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Simone electronic game in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Standing on porch looking towards the west at the moon. clear skies. noticed what i thought was an airplane since metro airport is 16 miles awy. noticed right away a  distinctive, non-blinking red light on a north/nw trajectory; no sudden changes in path. after about 5 seconds noticed a discharge of  reddish 'flare', just slightly smaller but still quite large, directly toward the ground. lasted about 2 seconds and dissipated (reminsicent of a firework flare). continued north. seemed to change to a whitish  red. went behind a tree. i got off the porch to track it, and in that short 5 second time it was gone completely. after not seeing the object anymore i saw an aircraft moving directly where the unidentified object should have been but just slightly higher up, heading on a east trajectory. i thought that it was being tracked. it appeared it absolutely would have crossed paths.
content.summary: Reddish star like object

content.detailedDescription:
This is an event that happened a long time ago. im writing this as its something that has always stuck out in my mind and was recently doing a search to see if there had been any other reports of this around the same timeframe. 

this was a past event that happened sometime in the 70s. i was probably around 11 years old at the time, so thinking the timeframe may have been around 1977/1978.  

i remember i was at my brother and (then at the time) sister in law's apartment. it was a 2 family house at the very end of woodland st in meriden at the dead end. my brother was not there and i was spending time with my sister in law. i believe we were doing a craft project.  

i remember it was getting darker out early so it must have been in the fall oct or nov. it must have been around 6 or 7pm. we had left the house because my sister in law was going to bring me back home (i lived in southington. as we walked to the driveway, we immediately saw something huge in the sky.  it was so big and so close to the ground, it was hovering just a little higher than the tree tops.  it moved slowly back and forth in either direction but basically stayed in the same spot hovering.  it was so large we were actually standing under it for a little while. again, i wish i could remember all the details vividly but it was so long ago.  i do remember multicolored lights underneath it. i believe they had a flicker or blink to them. the rest of the craft looked to be of a thick slate gray colored metal. it was a long circle shape from what i remember. what really stood out to me was the extremely large size. 

i remember my sister in law saying to me. what is that?? i don't think we were scared but just very curious at the time.  

i really cant remember what happened next as far as what happened to the object. if it started to ascend into the air or i don't remember seeing it ascend.  

i remember my sister in law telling me to get in the car we were going to follow it.. so it must have started to move from where we had seen it hover.  

as we were driving down the street. we could see it in the sky, so it was no longer in the location we saw it in. it was still pretty low in the sky though.  as we were driving down the street, we had seen a few people..Like someone on their bike who stopped to look at it and a couple of walkers.  we pulled the car over and rolled down our window and my sister in law said to them, are you seeing what we are seeing?  they said yes.  she had asked them if they knew what it was, they said no idea. 

from woodland st we had gone on chamberlain hwy, still following the craft but at this point could see it had gone much higher in the sky.  we had gotten onto 691 heading towards southington.  while on the highway, tall rocks, had obstructed my view and when we had reached an area of highway where the rocks didn't obstruct my view, i didn't see it anymore.  unsure whether it went too high in the sky, turned a different direction or just disappeared.  but last seen high near the cliffs at hubbard park, along 691 highway. 

there was at least 5 witnesses out on the street of woodland st that night that we had stopped the car along the way to talk to.  from the size of this, there had to be many more that saw it. 

just curious if anyone else had reported something similar around this time. 

my sister in law is no longer married to my brother. throughout the years, i have seen her infrequently but when i do, she brings up this story...Remember when we saw something? ... i haven't seen her in awhile but next time i run into her, i will have to question her on what she remembers of that night. perhaps she has more details
content.summary: Very large spacecraft seen in the 70s. multicolored lights. very low hovering on woodland st deadend. many witnesses.  got in the car to follow.  drove on 691 and ufo disapeared near hills of hubbard park.

content.detailedDescription: My son woke me up to come see these lights in the sky he and his friend noticed. there were several traveling on a purposeful tragectory.No wavering in hight or path. looked like fire and i'm certain it wasn't chinese lanterns. here's video [link moved to fi section/dr/cms]
content.summary: multiple lights traveling a pretty determined path. it was cloudy so eventually i lost site. looked like fire, but certain they weren't chinese lanterns

content.detailedDescription: I look at the skies at night and noticed something not normal. about a mile ne of my location and object with white, green and red lights was hovering stationary. it then went to the left only a short distance and then to the right the same way and then descended straight down until it went out of sight. in that area there is part of the pine barren area of long island.
content.summary: At time and place mentioned above, an object with lights appeared stationary then descended.

content.detailedDescription: this occurred in my bedroom.I was in bed watching television.It was almost 1130 pm. my bedroom door was closed,i had my window was open about afoot or so.My bed was a couple of feet from the window.My t.V.Is on my dresser directly at the foot of my bed. a couple of feet off.I have a couple of night stands on each side of my head board.My clock and my light with my remote next to me.With my light on i reached over to pick up the remote and turn off the t.V.Has i turned and point i saw this being in the room with me just to my left ay the bottom of my bed. at that instance i went to push forward and grab this thing and it paralyzed me, it knocked me back into the bed at this moment i put up my left hand. i wear an expensive watch, i always sleep with it on. i was fighting to stay up ,and on the verge of blacking out, and i remember saying do not touch my watch, do not touch my watch. i was still trying get this thing. what i was saying was mentally not verbally.At that point my arm was lifted up. and a circular yellowish white light in a circular inch and half thick irratic electric type of energy took mt watch off and i fell totally back into a fetal position. i rocked in this position just fighting to stay awake and my whole body was being paralyzed.My next memory was this thing standing over me on my right bending over me looking at me at that moment i opened my eyes for a moment, and i remember with excellent memory, and detail what i was looking at. that is what i remember.The being had very tight snake skin. a yellow dominate with white , and black accent colors,a snout,with snake eyes. i woke up around 845 am the morning, has i popped up my watch was off, and stacked up on my night stand next to mt alarm clock, and it all came back to me, everything.Later i told a girl friend about this, she said to look up reptile aliens online, an the exact alien was right there.I felt violated,amazed, and a host of other emotions that i still feel to this day.A couple of weeks later i went to the hospital seeking some one to talk to and all they wanted to do was commit me.After some talking and that this was an exprience and not a state of mind i was let go. never go to the hospital for this kind of expirience.
content.summary: Entity was in my bedroom. the entity paralyzed me upon me turning and  seeing it.

content.detailedDescription: I was a young man who family always went gold mining in san gabriel mountains.We had a camp site just beyond a 2 lane bridge about 1 mile .It was a long day as for a child we had dinner and went to sleep .We did not sleep in tents we slept in camping bags .I remember weakening up and looking at the sky and there was a ufo .It was at least 2 football fields long and maybe 100 feet up in the air.It had lights around it. it's shape was circle ,all it was doing was hovering above us . i did not think about it to much like i said i was a young child and besides who is going to believe a kid. but now as an adult i know what i saw.
content.summary: San gabriel mountains

content.detailedDescription: We were playing touch football with other teenagers in front of 1444 parkham crescent, just north of the pickering nuclear power plant in july, 1968, when our parents noticed weird lights hovering near the power plant. we watched for a good 15 minutes wondering what they were. then a bunch of army trucks went speeding down sandy beach road toward the power plant when the craft just zoomed off and was gone in a second. later on cfto news, dave devall reported that it was a weather balloon, which did not make sense to any of us. first of all, it was hovering for quite a long time and then it took off, faster than anything that i had ever seen before or since. it was not a weather balloon or any type of airplane or helicopter. i have written about it on facebook and there are others that were not in our group that night who also witnessed it.
content.summary: It was saucer light with strange blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: Hi i'm steve, more then a year ago i started a report to mofon about my ufo experience , but then never finished it due to a couple of reasons, one, my family are christians and don't believe in that and did not want to make to big a a deal about it, two, i got very sick and about died from that and took about two years to fully recover, and three, i moved, and four i first called the national ufo reporting center and that was a bad experience because he treated me like i was an idiot. the night of the sighting i took detailed notes and after my move i found all them notes. i'm not looking for anything i would just like to make sure you have my picture i took at close range and want you to have it on record for posterity . i had already believed in ufos due to the fact that mathematically its impossible for humans to be the only life in the universe   with that said its also not something i thought i would see right in front of me. it was oct 19th about 7:25 pm when i saw a  very bright object coming from space in a 45 degree angle moving very very fast, i thought that extremely strange cause meteors tend to ark and move slower then this was, when i realized that the impact was going to be very close to where i was i got very nervous and got ready for impact  when i saw it was about to hit the ground it completely leveled off with the ground without slowing down. it was on my side to the mountain and then came to a stop.. it began to move around and stopping then moving for a while until it got close to me. in front of my house there is a road and when it crossed the road it was just about 50 or so feet in front of me, thats when i saw the details of the craft.. it was orange to red in color  but the craft it self was a dull flat black. when i turned my camera on of my phone i took a pic but it had stated to move so it made it look like it was in motion, but you can still see the structure of the craft. it moved around for quite a while, then it went up to at least 5 to ten thousand feet when i realized there were f16's coming full after burners, thats when i noticed it went up to a much bigger object that was not as well lite and i seen smaller objects moving around it, the jets tried to reach their altitude but they moved higher, then speed out of sight at what seemed to be many thousands of miles an hour and with the jets moving at mock 2 looked as if the jets were standing still.  the thing i do find interesting is that minutes later other jets came to the mountain range and dropped a series of flares almost as if to already to make a cover story if people were to report this they could then say it was them dropping flares.. this is a very small town and not many people so i'm not sure if anyone else seen or reported this.. i just thought this was to important and wanted you to have record of it and my pic.  thank you.
content.summary: I saw a ufo coming straight down at a very high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: Me and one of my friends was leaving his house to walk to the store, as soon as we walked a few feet from his house i looked behind us and saw this thing coming our direction it was very large triangular shape and it had lights on the bottom of it it made no noise and it's like it was floating very low on a straight path. when it was directly above us i can remember like it was yesterday my friend said "what the heck is that"? i said i have no idea and floated on a straight path until we couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Me and a witnessed a large triangular shape craft with lights on the bottom of it float above us completely soundless

content.detailedDescription: I need to submit this as a pdf with my military bio as pdf
content.summary: 2 tlos overflew intel building from south china sea to mountains east of facility

content.detailedDescription: This happened along time ago. not even sure if it helps in any kind of way. just felt like getting off my chest. a few nights after my dad died, one of my friends and i were sitting on my front porch talking. i noticed through the trees, in the sky, out by the road, something pulsing different colors. it was hovering in one spot. i pointed it out to my friend. then we ran out to the road to see what it was. right about the time we got to the road it stopped pulsing and changed to only having two bigger bright white lights with a smaller one below them. as we watched it, it moved slowly left and right making no noise. it was also getting closer so obviously we started to get nervous. just as a car was coming down the road it moved out of sight because of the trees. it was the only time before or since that i seen it. one of my other friends in the neighborhood said he had seen the three white lights before when i told him the story. the one thing that makes it interesting to me is that we lived about 10 miles from a national guard army base. they have acres of land. more than enough room to test secret or extra terrestrial craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw something changing colors. ran to the road to see what it was then it changes to two big bright white lights with a smaller below it.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were at a local park near the address above, were arived at the park around 10pm local time to play basketball. after about an hour the court lights turned off( which they always do at 11pm) after gathering our things we sat on a bench about 100 ft from the court facing sw. we were sitting for 10 minutes talking about the day cooling down from our game when saw a very bright greenish light streak slowly across the sky from our right to left. we both stopped speaking and just watched. the orb then got alot brighter and i looked to my right at my friend to see his reaction when i saw that the light was bright enough to cast a shadow. when i looked back at the light it split into 3 separate orbs all glowing blueish green now and plusing in sync after that they vanish and both of us are left in disbelief.
content.summary: Glowing ball of light that split into 3 separate orbs and pulsated lights

content.detailedDescription:
Years ago, approx 1978-79.  my wife and i were attending the auto races at the old southwest speedway in amarillo tx.  (speedway now not in existence) this speedway was just west of the amarillo international airport.  while we were watching the races suddenly the power went out. there were no lights and all of us spectators were sitting in the dark and the races ceased.  we heard someone from the announcers box speak out from their window (no microphone of course) that the transformers had failed and that the power company was called out to restore power.  
as we all sat there in the spectators stands someone said "what is that up there?" i looked up behind us and saw a very large craft in the night sky.  i remember that it was a dark object and hard to tell what the exact shape was.  however, i did see brilliant white lights on the outside parts of the craft, with some of the lights seemingly moving separately from the main craft but still in unison yet unattached somehow.  by my estimation i think the craft was about 1/4 to 3/8 of a mile long and about 200-300 feet wide.  as the craft moved off to the north i saw a very large teardrop shaped dome underneath and in the front of the craft and it had large dull green, red, yellow-orange lights that were separated from each other.  kind of like a type of christmas ornament.  the craft was totally silent.  it moved off slowly in level flight and seemed to me that the craft was observing the crowded spectator stands of human beings.  that is my opinion.
content.summary: Watching races then facility lost power, lights etc. dark. object came around behind spectators stands. silent. appeared to be observing us.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo over red hawk casino placerville ca. recorded slow video down and look above hills near clouds. a disk shape dark grey or black craft you can see.
content.summary: Didn't see it when recording then in my video replaying it i had seen the disk shape ufo above the hills
